//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4 MinZ_MaxZRatio;
//   float NvStereoEnabled;
//   sampler2D NvStereoFixTexture;
//   float4 SampleOffsets[2];
//   sampler2D SceneColorTexture;
//   float4 ScreenPositionScaleBias;
//   float4x4 ScreenToShadowMatrix;
//   sampler2D ShadowDepthTexture;
//   float ShadowFadeFraction;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                    Reg   Size
//   ----------------------- ----- ----
//   ShadowFadeFraction      c0       1
//   ScreenPositionScaleBias c1       1
//   MinZ_MaxZRatio          c2       1
//   NvStereoEnabled         c3       1
//   ScreenToShadowMatrix    c7       4
//   SampleOffsets           c11      2
//   SceneColorTexture       s0       1
//   NvStereoFixTexture      s1       1
//   ShadowDepthTexture      s2       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c4, 0.0625, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c5, 0.999000013, 1, 0, 0.25
    dcl_texcoord v0.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15


// Unreal Engine stereo correction disabled by DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_4A7C9FEE_0.txt
def c3, 0, 0, 0, 0 // Overrides NvStereoEnabled passed from Unreal Engine

texldl r4, c220.z, s15
mov r5.xyw, v0
add r4.w, r5.w, -r4.y
mad r5.x, r4.w, r4.x, r5.x

    abs r0.x, c3.x
    if_ne c3.x, -c3.x
      texld r1, c4, s1
      add r0.y, -r1.y, r5.w
      mad r1.x, r1.x, r0.y, r5.x
      mov r1.yz, r5.xyww
    else
      mov r1.xyz, c4.y
    endif
    cmp r0.xyz, -r0.x, r5.xyww, r1
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mad r0.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r0.zw, c4.y
    texldl r0, r0, s0
    add r0.x, r0.w, -c2.y
    add r0.y, -r0.x, c4.z
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    cmp r0.x, r0.y, c4.w, r0.x
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c2.x
    rcp r0.y, r5.w
    mul r0.yz, r0.y, r5.xxyw
    mul r0.yz, r0.x, r0
    mul r1, r0.z, c8

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_4A7C9FEE_0.txt
add r4.w, r0.x, -r4.y
mad r0.y, -r4.w, r4.x, r0.y

    mad r1, c7, r0.y, r1
    mad r0, c9, r0.x, r1
    add r0, r0, c10
    rcp r0.w, r0.w
    min r1.z, r0.z, c5.x
    mad_pp r2, r0.xyxy, r0.w, c11
    mad r1.xyw, r2.xyzx, c5.yyzz, c5.zzzy
    texldp_pp r3, r1, s2
    mad r1.xyw, r2.zwzx, c5.yyzz, c5.zzzy
    texldp r2, r1, s2
    add_pp r0.z, r2.x, r3.x
    mad_pp r2, r0.xyxy, r0.w, c12
    mov_pp r1.xy, r2
    texldp r3, r1, s2
    add_pp r0.x, r0.z, r3.x
    mov_pp r1.xy, r2.zwzw
    texldp r1, r1, s2
    add_pp r0.x, r0.x, r1.x
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, c5.w
    mad r0.x, r0.x, r0.x, -c5.y
    mov r0.y, c5.y
    mad_pp r0.x, c0.x, r0.x, r0.y
    rsq_pp r0.x, r0.x
    rcp_pp oC0, r0.x

// approximately 51 instruction slots used (7 texture, 44 arithmetic)
